reference.shortdesc: A glossarylist indicates to the processing software that the author wants a list of glossary entries at the particular location in the book..

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: When the href attribute is not specified, a processor might generate a list of glossary entries at the specified location in the map.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The glossarylist element is specialized from topicref. It is defined in the bookmap module.
